column5: The past three days here in oshawa my buddies and I have been playing road hockey. So whats so good about that you ask? Dont all Canadian guys play road hockey? Well, yes, but not always in T shirts on december 20th, 21st and 22nd! This weather is way to weird, usually were out playin on the ponds by now, but not this year. I hate the cold personally, but BRING ON THE ICE! I may not be an ice fisherman,  but a concerned pond hockey enthusiast!

oh man, it was a blast playing road and pond hockey, we'd bring out the steel nets and play from sun up till sun down some days. 5 on 5, 4 on 4, it was a blast!  i lived in oshawa for about 10 years, they were the best years of my life soo far...

I played tons of street hockey (ball hockey) in laneways, schoolyards and even in arenas with the Ontario Ball Hockey League for a few years.  If you guys were closer, I'd join you for a game or two. (if you don't mind playing with a fat, old guy)
Thats all we did year round. Kinda a tradition to kill time and we still do at family get togethers. I grew up in a hockey family.
